product.title: Isvgxsz Hot Hair Tool Travel Bag with Heat Resistant Mat for Curling Iron Straightener Flat Iron Hair Dryer Hair Accessories Organizer Case Travel Essential for Women Travel Bag with Interior Pocket
product.description:
Curling Iron Storage Bag Hair Straightener Hanging Bag Travel Storage Bag
Features:
Our suitcases are made of fabrics with soft padding inside, which is scratch- and sturdy.
Large Storage Space The main compartment has 4 padded individual slots to hold long barrels, hair dryers and other accessories. 1 transparent zipper pocket is large enough to hold your items such as hair clips, hair spray or other curling accessories.
Convenient design This suitcase is equipped with a 360째 rotating non-slip hook, which can be hidden without affecting the appearance. The allows you to carry it easily when traveling.
Fashionable and elegant, it incorporates fashionable plaid elements, colors, and portable design, suitable for travel or daily use. The soft material allows you to easily put it into a suitcase or backpack, which is not your travel suitcase, but also a great toiletry bag, which is convenient, practical, and cost-effective.
A great , lovers, family, home, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, anniversaries. You can't go wrong with this choice.
Product Description:
Color: Black//Blue
Size: 30 .5 x 16 cm
Material: Polyester
Applicable gender: Both men and women
